title: (x) Simple Sans-Serif. I swear I know it...please help. - AG Old Face, Vectora {Mark S}
content: Thought I knew it...Thank you for the help.
author: propagandi

comments.content: Actually maybe Engravers' Gothic. Looks slightly condensed. Engravers Gothic has the short middle bar for the \*E\* where Gotham or Avenir wouldn't.

Looks to me like this is two different faces: [AG Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20100325191912/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-old-face-bq/) (top) and [Vectora](http://web.archive.org/web/20100325191912/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vectora/) (bottom).

Vectora is it! Thank you so much Mark.

Greg
